channel.title: Npc attack emotion
channel.description:
Where do I find a list of NPC ATTACK EMOTIONS..like [code] } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 41) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x037; // chicken attack[/code] animNumber is the emotion of the npc attack so 0×037
hope someone can help me.
BTW I need the emotions for my gsmini game.

item.title: Npc attack emotion
